Module Contents

.. py:type:: Trajectory
   :canonical: xr.Dataset


.. py:class:: _Trajectory(initial_ds)

   Bases: :py:obj:`shnitsel.data.proxy_class.Proxy`


   Class to wrap trajectory information in a shnitsel-conform format.

   Used to keep track of original data while the trajectory data is modified


   .. py:method:: get_current_raw()


   .. py:method:: get_original_raw()
